1.author: Kin Hubbard
1.quote: Nobody ever forgets where he buried the hatchet.

2.author: Don Marquis
2.quote: When a man tells you that he got rich through hard work, ask him: 'Whose?'

3.author: Sean O'Casey
3.quote: All the world's a stage and most of us are desperately unrehearsed.

4.author: James Joyce
4.quote: Christopher Columbus, as everyone knows, is honored by posterity because he was the last to discover America.

5.author: Les Dawson
5.quote: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.

7.author: Sinclair Lewis
7.quote: People will buy anything that is 'one to a customer.'
